titleStmt.title: The Mathematicall divine, shewing, the pesent miseries of Germany, England and Ireland. Being the effects portended by the last comet or blazing-starre of a dreadfull greatnesse, and in forme of a crooked sword, which was seene with great admiration in Europe, Anno. 1618. As also a necessary consolation to the distressed Protestants in both those his Majesties kingdomes.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
